resources.string: The Monitoring Centre has been contacted. If you no longer required assistance, please cancel the alert using the button below
In order for myprotect to provide your lone worker service, we require the following permissions to be granted
All these permissions are required to provide your lone worker service. Click back to change your selection or close the app.
We use phone calls to raise alerts
We use this to direct assistance to you when you raise a Red Alert (Enabling privacy mode in your phone settings will prevent anyone other than the alarm handler seeing your location)
Notification may include alerts sounds and icon badges. These can be configured in Settings.
Appear on Top must be enable to allow calls to be made during the event of incapacitation.
Battery optimization must be disabled to allow location information to be captured consistently.
Bluetooth must be ON when compatible myprotect accessories are being used. This is a communication between the accessory and the application remain open to allow alerts to be raised.
Quick press button 3 times to complete your setup
